_comment: Job application config. Remove _comment if your loader rejects unknown keys. cover_letter_template supports {job_title} and {company_name}. board: greenhouse | lever | ashby. Use job_urls for manual URLs (any mix of boards), or leave [] to search via job_search_query.
cover_letter_template: I am excited to apply for the {job_title} role at {company_name}. I believe my experience aligns well with this opportunity and I would welcome the chance to discuss further.
